``GUID Type`` :version:`1.20.0`
===============================

.. code-block:: hexpat

    #include <type/guid.pat>

| This file contains a type to visualize RFC 4122 GUIDs
|

------------------------

Types
-----

``type::GUID``

**Visualizes a 128 bit RFC 4122 GUID.**
